summary.span: 使用指定的错误消息和内部异常初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message and inner exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此构造函数使用 `message` 参数初始化 属性，并使用 `innerException` 参数初始化 属性。This constructor uses the `message` parameter to initialize the property and the `innerException` parameter to initialize the property. 如果未 `null``innerException`，则在处理 `innerException`的 catch 块中引发当前异常。If `innerException` is not `null`, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles `innerException`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此构造函数。The following code example demonstrates calling this constructor. [!code-cpp[NclMailSync#32](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CPP/NclMailSync.cpp#32)] [!code-csharp[NclMailSync#32](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/NCLMailSync/CS/mail.cs#32)]
